snippet: Colon became the first Met to throw a complete game this season, and his stretch of innings pitched without allowing a run grew to 25.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Bartolo Colon pitches shutout in Mets 7-0 win over Marlins; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Colon became the first Met to throw a complete game this season, and his stretch of innings pitched without allowing a run grew to 25.

headline.print_headline: Colon Extends Scoreless Streak With Shutout
headline.main: Mets’ Bartolo Colon Extends Scoreless Streak With Shutout of Marlins
